languages.text: {n}Сервочерепа, с гудением парящие вокруг вас, издают целую арию приветственных бинарных звуков. Оптикон-22 отвечает им неторопливым кивком головы.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервочерепа, с гудением парящие вокруг вас, издают целую арию приветственных бинарных звуков. Оптикон-22 отвечает им неторопливым кивком головы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binary greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binary greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binary greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binary greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}
{n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伺服头骨集群发出低沉的嗡鸣声，在你身边盘旋，以二进制语进行致意，而奥普蒂孔22号也简短地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨集群发出低沉的嗡鸣声，在你身边盘旋，以二进制语进行致意，而奥普蒂孔22号也简短地点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブーンという音をたててあなたの周りを漂うサーヴォスカルたちが、バイナリック挨拶音の本格的な讃美歌を奏で始める。オプティコン-22は落ち着いた頷きで応えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブーンという音をたててあなたの周りを漂うサーヴォスカルたちが、バイナリック挨拶音の本格的な讃美歌を奏で始める。オプティコン-22は落ち着いた頷きで応えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die summenden Servoschädel, die um dich herumschweben, bringen eine veritable binhärische Arie der Begrüßung zu Gehör. Opticon-22 antwortet mit einem knappen Nicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die summenden Servoschädel, die um dich herumschweben, bringen eine veritable binhärische Arie der Begrüßung zu Gehör. Opticon-22 antwortet mit einem knappen Nicken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etrafında süzülen hizmeletlerin mırıltıları âdeta bir ikilidil selam aryasına dönüşüyor. Opticon-22 ise ölçülü bir baş hareketiyle karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etrafında süzülen hizmeletlerin mırıltıları âdeta bir ikilidil selam aryasına dönüşüyordu. Opticon-22 ise ölçülü bir baş hareketiyle karşılık verdi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El zumbido de los servocráneos flotando a tu alrededor se convierte en toda una aria de saludos binarios. Opticon-22 responde con un gesto de cabeza comedido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El zumbido de los servocráneos flotando a tu alrededor se convierte en toda una aria de saludos binarios. Opticon-22 responde con un gesto de cabeza comedido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les servocrânes qui planent autour de vous entonnent une véritable aria de sons binhaires en guise de salut. Opticon-22 répond par un hochement de tête mesuré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The humming servo-skulls hovering around you break into a veritable aria of binharic greeting sounds. Opticon-22 responds with a measured nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servocrânes qui planent autour de vous entonnent une véritable aria de sons binhaires en guise de salut. Opticon-22 répond par un hochement de tête mesuré.{/n}
